Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3900 PASEO DEL SOL, SANTA FE, New Mexico, 87507, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NextTrip is a technology-powered platform offering innovative travel booking and media solutions. NextTrip Leisure serves both individual and group travelers with curated vacation options to top destinations across Mexico, the Caribbean, and worldwide. Through NextTrip Media's Travel Magazine, users can explore, learn about, and share with friends. Additionally, NextTrip has launched Compass tv a FAST travel planning channel that combines advertising, and brand engagement to drive bookings.
